title: Yoruba test
content: Our convenient, fast, and affordable English test integrates the latest assessment science and AI — empowering anyone to accurately test their English where and when they’re at their best.

title: for schools
content: Teachers, we’re here to help you! Our free tools support your students as they learn languages through the Duolingo app, both in and out of the classroom.

title: abc
content: From language to literacy! With fun phonics lessons and delightful stories, Duolingo ABC helps kids ages 3–8 learn to read and write — 100% free.

title: math
content: Our free, bite-sized approach — but for math! Fun lessons help students get ahead in their math classes, while adults can brain train to boost their mental math skills.
